definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
base rate (e.g. interest rate set by central bank)

sentences.english: A noble professional virtue is in accord with the fundamental interests of the Party and the people.
sentences.chinese: 崇高的職業道德是與黨和人民的根本利益相一致的。

sentences.english: Facts have proven that the establishment of diplomatic ties between China and Dominica conforms to the fundamental interest of both countries.
sentences.chinese: 事實證明，中多建交符合兩國的根本利益。

sentences.english: To always represent the fundamental interests of the overwhelming majority of the Chinese people, our Party must.
sentences.chinese: 我們黨要始終代表中國最廣大人民的根本利益。

sentences.english: The breakeven point analysis is kernel content of the cost volume profit model.
sentences.chinese: 保本點分析是量本利分析的核心內容。

sentences.english: Moreover, it catalyzes an unusual two-step reaction that is of great fundamental interest.
sentences.chinese: 此外，催化不尋常的兩步反應，具有極大的根本利益。

sentences.english: To develop bilateral comprehensive cooperative relations conforms to the fundamental interest of both countries.
sentences.chinese: 發展中新全面合作關係符合兩國的根本利益。

sentences.english: This decision represents the fundamental interests of the people.
sentences.chinese: 這個決定反映了廣大人民的根本利益。

sentences.english: She entrusted all her savings to a shark who had promised to double her money.
sentences.chinese: 她把全部積蓄交給一個答應給她加倍償付本利的騙子。

sentences.english: The peaceful use of outer space is in the interest of all peoples of the world.
sentences.chinese: 和平利用外空符合世界各國人民的根本利益。

sentences.english: The jumping-off place of socialism policy all along should be the people's fundamental interests.
sentences.chinese: 社會主義政策的出發點始終是人民羣衆的根本利益。

sentences.english: I want to especially stress that peace and stability on the Peninsula serve the fundamental interest of all parties.
sentences.chinese: 我想特別強調，半島的和平穩定符合各方的根本利益。

sentences.english: She entrusted all her savings to a shark who had promised to double her money .
sentences.chinese: 她把全部儲蓄交給一個答應給她加倍償付本利的騙子。

sentences.english: This redefining takes many forms, Le says.
sentences.chinese: 這個重構過程有很多形式，本利說。

sentences.english: The project is very profitable , with a profit margin as high as 100%.
sentences.chinese: 這個項目的收益很高，基本上是對本利。

sentences.english: The developing countries share the same fundamental interests.
sentences.chinese: 發展中國家的根本利益是一致的。

sentences.english: We provide public services to meet the fundamental interests of the people.
sentences.chinese: 我們所說的公共服務，就是要爲人民的根本利益服務。

definition: to fall due/to come to the end of a term/to expire
both principal and interest/capital plus profit
variant of 盈餘|盈余[ying2 yu2]
to pay back in full/to redeem a debt
